description: Create a job schedule shift start-at change.
permissions: Allowed for admins. Otherwise, permitted when the user can create the related job (per Job policy), or when the shift is flexible and the user is a manager member of the accepted trucker for the broker tender. The policy allows create attempts even if the job schedule shift is missing, but validations will then fail.
side_effects: Creates a job schedule shift start-at change record; updates the job schedule shift start time to the new value, adjusts end time by the same difference when present, sets old start-at values, permits schedule changes on the shift, and after commit creates notifications and schedules check-in requests for accepted broker tender job schedule shifts.
validation_notes: --job-schedule-shift is required. --new-start-at is required and must be ISO 8601. The new start time must differ from the current start time. If the shift has start-at bounds, the new start time must be within them. For non-flexible shifts, flexible shift attributes (start-at min/max) must not be set. The related job must be movable, the shift must pass reschedule validation (no driver day comments), and if a driver is assigned the job production plan must be approved. The associated job schedule shift must be valid.
